Issue.summary: Transaction Processor Mock Testing for JAVA
Issue.description: A simillar mock is available for python, https://sawtooth.hyperledger.org/docs/core/releases/1.0.1/app_developers_guide/testing.html Â , it will be good if JAVA SDK has the same. For enterprise a well tested TP / Code is a must to pass a build.
